hints.title: Foster-Lyapunov Drift (Unconditional)
hints.content:
57: :label: thm-fl-recap
58: 
59: The composed operator $\Psi_{\text{total}} = \Psi_{\text{kin}} \circ \Psi_{\text{clone}}$ satisfies:
60: 
61: $$
62: \mathbb{E}[V_{\text{total}}(S') \mid S] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{total}}\tau) V_{\text{total}}(S) + C_{\text{total}}
63: $$
64: 
65: where:
66: - $V_{\text{total}} = V_W + c_V V_{\text{Var}} + c_B W_b$ is a synergistic Lyapunov function
67: - $\kappa_{\text{total}} > 0$ is independent of N
68: - $C_{\text{total}} < \infty$ is the constant drift term

hints.label: thm-lsi-target
hints.title: Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality (Target)
hints.content:
78: :label: thm-lsi-target
79: 
80: For all smooth functions $f: \mathcal{S}_N \to \mathbb{R}$ with $\int f^2 d\pi_{\text{QSD}} = 1$:
81: 
82: $$
83: \text{Ent}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}} \cdot \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}[|\nabla f|^2]
84: $$
85: 
86: where:
87: - $\text{Ent}_{\pi}(g) = \int g \log(g/\int g) d\pi$ is the relative entropy
hints.raw_directive:
75: ### What We Want
76: 
77: :::{prf:theorem} Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality (Target)
78: :label: thm-lsi-target
79: 
80: For all smooth functions $f: \mathcal{S}_N \to \mathbb{R}$ with $\int f^2 d\pi_{\text{QSD}} = 1$:
81: 
82: $$
83: \text{Ent}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}} \cdot \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}[|\nabla f|^2]
84: $$
85: 
86: where:
87: - $\text{Ent}_{\pi}(g) = \int g \log(g/\int g) d\pi$ is the relative entropy
88: - $|\nabla f|^2 = \sum_{i=1}^N |\nabla_{x_i} f|^2 + |\nabla_{v_i} f|^2$ is the squared gradient

hints.label: ex-fl-no-lsi
hints.title: Random Walk on ℤ
hints.content:
97: :label: ex-fl-no-lsi
98: 
99: Consider a lazy random walk on the integers with transition:
100: $$
101: P(x, x \pm 1) = \frac{1}{4}, \quad P(x, x) = \frac{1}{2}
102: $$
103: 
104: and stationary measure $\pi$ geometric: $\pi(x) \propto e^{-|x|}$.
105: 
106: **Has Foster-Lyapunov**: With $V(x) = |x|$:
107: $$
108: \mathbb{E}[V(X_{t+1})] \leq (1 - c)V(X_t) + C
109: $$
